channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - August 7, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-august-7-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _ALIEN_ * _Apocalypse Keys_ * _Apocalypse World Burned Over_ * _BALIKBAYAN_ * _Beam Saber_ * _Better The Devil Who Serves You_ * _Bounty of the Week_ * _Checkpoint Midnight_ * _Getting to Philosophy_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Keepers of the Cards_ * _Leverage_ * _Masks_ * _Masters of Umdaar_ * _Once More Into the Vortex_ * _Red Markets_ * _Révolution_ * _Trophy Gold_ * _Tuk Fast Tuk Furious_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_ * _Under Hollow Hills_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - August 7, 2020
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • ALIEN
  • Apocalypse Keys
  • Apocalypse World Burned Over
  • BALIKBAYAN
  • Beam Saber
  • Better The Devil Who Serves You

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Hangouts category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar to play!
